section.title: Installation and Setup
section.para: Follow these steps to install and configure the product.

section.title: System Requirements
section.para: Before installing, ensure your system meets these requirements:

listitem.para: Download the installation package from our website
Run the installer with administrator privileges

section.title: Initial Configuration
section.para: After installation, configure your environment:
section.programlisting:
# Set your API key export API_KEY="your-api-key-here"
# Initialize the configuration product init --config=production
# Verify installation product --version

section.title: Quick Start Tutorial
section.para: This 5-minute tutorial will walk you through creating your first project.

listitem.para: Create a new project: product create my-project
Navigate to the project directory: cd my-project
Run the development server: product dev

chapter.title: Core Concepts
chapter.para: Understanding these core concepts will help you use the product more effectively.

section.title: Architecture Overview
section.para: The product uses a modular architecture with three main components:

listitem.para: Frontend Layer - User interface and presentation
Business Logic Layer - Core processing and workflows

section.title: Data Model
section.para: The product organizes information using a hierarchical data model.

section.title: Projects
section.para: A project is the top-level container for your work. Each project can contain multiple workspaces and resources.

section.title: Workspaces
section.para: Workspaces allow you to organize related resources and collaborate with team members.

section.title: Resources
section.para: Resources are the individual items you create and manage within workspaces.

section.title: Security and Permissions
section.para: The product implements role-based access control (RBAC) to secure your data.

chapter.title: Best Practices
chapter.para: Follow these best practices to get the most out of the product.

section.title: Organizing Your Work
section.para: Keep your projects organized with these tips:

listitem.para: Use clear, descriptive names for projects and resources
Create separate workspaces for different teams or departments
Archive completed projects to reduce clutter

section.title: Performance Optimization
section.para: Optimize performance with these recommendations:

tip.para: Enable caching for frequently accessed resources to improve response times.

warning.para: Avoid creating circular dependencies between resources as this can cause performance degradation.

section.title: Security Best Practices
section.para: Keep your data secure:

listitem.para: Enable two-factor authentication for all users
Regularly rotate API keys and access tokens
Follow the principle of least privilege when assigning roles
Enable audit logging for compliance requirements

section.title: Connection Failed
section.para: Error: "Unable to connect to server"
Solution: Check your network connection and firewall settings.

section.title: Authentication Failed
section.para: Error: "Invalid credentials"
Solution: Verify your API key is correct and not expired.
